Package com.doa.engine

Interface DoaEngineWindow

  • public interface DoaEngineWindow
    Exists for conveniency, all windows that house the game must implement this interface. Typical usage is sub-classing javax.swing.JFrame and implementing this interface.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Doga Oruc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.awt.Component add​(java.awt.Component doaEngine)
      Shadows the default add() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function.
      default void concatTickPipeline()
      Should be overridden when there are objects that don't fit the concept of DoaObject, but need ticking.
      int getHeight()
      Shadows the default getHeight() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function.
      int getWidth()
      Shadows the default getWidth() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function.
      default void overlay​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Should be overridden when there needs to be an overlay to render, like a HUD.
      default void preRender​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Should be overridden when there needs to be objects to render before the actual rendering takes place, like map backgrounds.
      void setVisible​(boolean b)
      Shadows the default setVisible() method in java.awt.Frame, required for DoaEngine to function.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Shadows the default getWidth() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function. Overriding isn't enforced.
        Returns:
        the width of the window

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Shadows the default getHeight() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function. Overriding isn't enforced.
        Returns:
        the height of the window

      • add

        java.awt.Component add​(java.awt.Component doaEngine)
        Shadows the default add() method in java.awt.Container, required for DoaEngine to function. Overriding isn't enforced.
        Parameters:
        doaEngine - instance of doaEngine
        Returns:
        the added component

      • setVisible

        void setVisible​(boolean b)
        Shadows the default setVisible() method in java.awt.Frame, required for DoaEngine to function. Overriding isn't enforced.
        Parameters:
        b - true if this frame is resizable; false otherwise.

      • concatTickPipeline

        default void concatTickPipeline()
        Should be overridden when there are objects that don't fit the concept of DoaObject, but need ticking. Custom objects should be ticked here. Example usage: HUD.tick();

      • overlay

        default void overlay​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Should be overridden when there needs to be an overlay to render, like a HUD. Example usage: HUD.render();
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context of DoaEngine

      • preRender

        default void preRender​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Should be overridden when there needs to be objects to render before the actual rendering takes place, like map backgrounds. Example usage: g.drawImage(image, 0, 0, getHeight(), getWidth(), null);
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context of DoaEngine
